channel.title: Telemarketting troubles
channel.description: okay well my mom likes to do online surveys for about a week like 2 months ago. within a week of me figuring out she was doing them i explained how they were all bullshit and how she wasted all her time. i am getting so fucking tired of them calling my house that today i told them my mom moved and they were like "yeah i am sure she did". they can't do anything to do besides putting us on the call this residents every 5 fuckin minutes list can they?

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @Whitey_b Whitey b
item.description:
@Whitey_b wrote:

Or just tell them you want your number removed from their databse, or you’ll sue them for abusing your privacy. Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

Tell them to GTFO

My friend’s dad swears at them and insults them, it’s so funny.
Or do a prank call to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

When they call again, pick up the phone and scream for help. See if they call the police. If they do, they can get fined for calling the police without a good reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

or fart on the phone and hang up, then when they phone up again burp on it and then keep doing things like that

Read full topic

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yeah just do what davidude said “Sorry i am going to have to put you on hold” and just leave the phone until they give up

Read full topic

item.title: Telemarketting troubles
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

you could always have some fun… like when they ring - tell them you are putting them on hold, they will be like!? lolwat

I suggest you get a number change and make sure its a secured number and is ex-directory. That way you shouldn’t get any more advertisement calls as long as you don’t give out your number again.

Read full topic
